What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

98.movie_plot: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

163.movie_plot: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

86.movie_plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

15.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

126.movie_plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

17.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

116.movie_plot: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.

57.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

109.movie_plot: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

107.movie_plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
